mapper.select: select * from loginuser where account=#{account} and password=MD5(#{password}) and del = 0

select l.* from loginuser as l where l.`del` = 0 and l.agency_id in
#{item}
and ( l.username like concat('%', #{param.keyword}, '%') or l.account like concat('%', #{param.keyword}, '%') )
and (select count(1) from user_position where user_id = l.id and `position` in (#{param.userPositions})) > 0
